text: Nuko umugore yari abereye mu rugo yifuza (kuryamana na we), ndetse anakinga imiryango maze aravuga ati "Ngwino unyegere". (Yusufu) aravuga ati "Nikinze kuri Allah(ngo andinde ikibi)! Mu byâ€™ukuri, we (umugabo wawe) ni databuja, yanyakiriye neza (sinshobora kumuhemukira). Rwose abahemu ntibazakiranuka
